head.description: Shrink the size of your video, audio, and PDF files. Available for free on Windows, macOS, and Linux.

jsRequired.title: JavaScript disabled
jsRequired.content: To visit this website, you need to enable JavaScript in your browser settings. Click here to learn more.

hero.title: Make your files get in shape üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

quality.title: Perfect Balance
quality.content: Choose from multiple presets while compressing your files. Save space without impacting much on the final result.
quality.secondaryContent: Settings adjust video quality without changing resolution. FPS and audio quality will be reduced below the 'Medium' preset.

conversions.title: Conversions
conversions.content: Keep only the audio track from a video, or create a video from an MP3 file! You can also convert to a GIF.
conversions.secondaryContent: For advanced cases, you can even set a custom thumbnail for your audio file and choose the number of FPS for your GIFs.

offline.title: Offline
offline.content: Rest assured your data never passes through a server, the app works without any internet access. Your files, your data, no limits.
offline.secondaryContent: Processing is handled locally using modules included during FileWeightLoss installation or downloadable from settings.

cta.title: Download File Weight Loss and reduce your file sizes by up to 95%!
cta.content: Make storing and sharing large files easier on platforms with storage limits, and boost your productivity.

advancedSupports.title: Advanced Supports
advancedSupports.content: Most common video, audio, and photo formats are supported. A module for PDF documents is also available.

fast.title: Simple and Fast
fast.content: Don't waste time, open File Weight Loss, drag your files in, and start compressing without waiting.

free.title: Free and Ad-free
free.content: Completely free, no ads, open-source, and available on all desktop systems (macOS, Windows, Linux).

efficient.title: Up to 95%
efficient.content: Push the limits and compress your videos by up to 95% with powerful optimizations!

browser.title: Try in your Browser
browser.content: Soon available to try without downloading the app via a limited version offering the same compression power.

multilanguage.title: Multilingual
multilanguage.content: Fully translated into English and French. We also won't add language-dependent properties to your files.

download.defaultModalContent: An issue occurred while rendering this component. Please try again later and report this problem.
download.shareDownloadTitle: FileWeightLoss for macOS, Windows, and Linux!

macos.title: Mac
macos.content:
From macOS Big Sur (11).
Apple Silicon and Intel CPUs.
macos.smallFormatContent: Compatible with macOS Big Sur (11) or later for Intel and Silicon Macs
macos.downloadInstructionsContent:
File Weight Loss is not notarized by Apple, which means an additional step is required before you can open the app.

  • 1. After dragging the File Weight Loss app into your Applications folder, open it from the Finder or Launchpad.
  • 2. Open System Settings and go to the Privacy & Security tab.
  • 3. Allow the app to run from the Security section.

Alternatively, you can use the following commands:

$ sudo spctl --master-disable
$ sudo chmod -R 777 /Applications/File\ Weight\ Loss.app
$ xattr -d com.apple.quarantine /Applications/File\ Weight\ Loss.app
$ xattr -cr /Applications/File\ Weight\ Loss.app
